faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Describe Music is an AI-powered platform that analyzes audio files to provide detailed descriptions, technical data, and creative insights.
faq.a2: Our analysis is powered by advanced AI models, providing highly accurate results for a wide range of audio types. However, like any AI, it should be used as a powerful assistant, not an infallible judge.
faq.q3: What happens to the audio files I upload?
faq.a3: We prioritize your privacy and security. Uploaded files are processed securely and are not used for any purpose other than providing you with an analysis. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.
faq.q4: What audio formats do you support?
faq.a4: We support all major audio formats, including MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, and more.

final_cta.title: Ready to Hear the Unheard?
